Weapon.Name: Shadow's Whisper
Weapon.Description: A dagger that murmurs with the voices of the past, as silent as the shadows it was born from.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you strike from the shadows, your enemy's voice fades into silence.

Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Void
Weapon.Description: A longbow imbued with the essence of the void, its arrows whisper death as they fly.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: An arrow, silent but deadly, sows chaos among your foes.

Weapon.Name: Twilight's Edge
Weapon.Description: A sword that was forged in the dying light of the twilight, harnessing the day's last shadows.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swing, darkness envelops your enemies, leaving them paralyzed by fear.
